error.current: The applicant date of birth must be in the past.
error.invalid: The applicant date of birth must be valid in the following format: YYYY-MM-DD (Year-Month-Day).
error.required: The applicant date of birth is required.

check-again: Check the status of another application
description: Fill in the fields below to check the status of your passport application. Make sure your information matches your passport application form.

esrf.help: If you can't find your file number, you can <Link>request to receive it</Link>.
esrf.label: File number

error.required: The given name(s) of applicant is required.

previous: Check the status of another application
reset: Check the status of another application
header: Check the status of your passport application

1.label: Being processed
1.description: Your application has been received and is in progress. If any further information is required, we will contact you.

2.label: Issued and Ready for Pickup
2.description: Your passport will be issued and ready for pick-up on your scheduled pick-up date. You must wait until your scheduled pick-up date to pick up your passport. Your passport pick-up date will show on your pick-up receipt.

3.label: Issued and Shipping Canada Post
3.description: Your passport has been issued and shipped using Canada Post. Please note that any documents you provided to support your passport application will be shipped to you separately.
3.tracking: You can track this shipment on Canada Post's website using the tracking code:

4.label: Issued and Shipping Fedex
4.description: Your passport has been issued and shipped using FedEx. Please note that any documents you provided to support your passport application will be shipped to you separately.
4.tracking: You can track this shipment on FedEx's website using the tracking code:

5.label: Not acceptable for processing
5.description: We reviewed your application and you will receive further communication by mail or by phone from the Passport Program.

99.label: Application No Longer Meets Criteria for Use
99.description: If you're seeing this then something has gone wrong.

status-is: The latest status of your application according to our records is:

error.required: The surname of applicant is required.

cannot-provide-result.title: We cannot provide a result at this time because:
cannot-provide-result.reason1: the information you provided does not match the information in our system;
cannot-provide-result.reason2: we have not yet received your application; or
cannot-provide-result.reason3: we have received your application but have not yet started processing it.

cannot-give-status.description: We can't give you your application status right now

list.item-1: the information you gave us doesn't match the information in our system or
list.item-2: we received your application, but haven't started processing it yet

no-record.contact-us: If you can't get your application status using this tool, or if your application is taking longer than the service standard, please call us toll free at {{phoneNumber}}.
no-record.double-check: Double-check your information and try again. If we still can't find your file, you can try again tomorrow. We update our records daily.

being-processed.received: We have received your application and are now processing it
being-processed.we-will-contact: If we need more information, we'll contact you by email or telephone. We will never use text or instant messages to contact you about your passport application.

ready-for-pickup.check-receipt: The passport is on its way to the pick-up location. Check your receipt to confirm the date and location
ready-for-pickup.not-available: The passport will not be available before the pick-up date printed on your receipt

shipped-canada-post.header: The passport has been printed and mailed
shipped-canada-post.mailing: We're mailing it to you by Canada Post.
shipped-canada-post.supporting-documents: We may send your supporting documents back separately.

shipped-fedex.header: The passport has been printed and sent to the United States
shipped-fedex.mailing: We're sending it to you by FedEx.
shipped-fedex.supporting-documents: You'll receive the passport and supporting documents in the same envelope.

not-acceptable.cannot-process: We have reviewed your application and can't process it further
not-acceptable.explanation: We're sending you a letter explaining why and will return your supporting documents at the same time.
not-acceptable.call-us: For more information, call us toll free at {{phoneNumber}}.

status-check-contact.call-us: Call us toll free at {{phoneNumber}} if your application is taking longer than the service standard

status-check-urgent.description: If you need the passport within 10 business days, learn <Link>how to get urgent or express service for your existing application</Link>

status-check-tracking.can-track: You can track the package online

status-check-call: Call us toll free at {{phoneNumber}} if you don't receive your documents within 4 weeks of receiving your passport.

header-messages.matches: Make sure your information matches your proof of citizenship and supporting ID. Your proof of citizenship could be one of the following:

list.item-4: other documents, like a naturalization certificate

header-messages.for-child-application: For child applications, use the child's given name(s) and surname and date of birth, exactly as provided on their proof of citizenship.
